ThingDef.label: casino honeycomb
ThingDef.description: This is a honeycomb produced by casino bees. Casino bees are avid gamblers, always ready to roll the dice. Honeycombs can be processed in a Honey Extractor to get honey, beeswax and a single normal dice.

ThingDef.label: ominous honeycomb
ThingDef.description: This is a honeycomb produced by ominous bees. An entire breed of bees characterized by their obscene bad luck, ominous bees always see the worst in any situation. They will extract shards of nearby dice and produce honeycombs that extract into Dice of Bad Omen. Honeycombs can be processed in a Honey Extractor to get black honey, beeswax and a single dice of bad omen.

ThingDef.label: fortunate honeycomb
ThingDef.description: This is a honeycomb produced by fortunate bees. An entire breed of bees characterized by their incredible good luck, fortunate bees are irredeemable optimists. They will extract shards of nearby dice and produce honeycombs that extract into Dice of Fortune. Honeycombs can be processed in a Honey Extractor to get white honey, beeswax and a single dice of fortune.
